column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
column21: Plunging Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG.
column167: Baron Bunny: The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage.
column168: Hold: • Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. • Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP. • When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
column217: One Arrow to Rule Them All
column218: Burst Fiery Rain DMG Per Wave
column298: Every Arrow Finds Its Target: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.
column299: Precise Shot: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.
column300: One Arrow to Rule Them All: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.
column301: Bunny Triggered: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it. Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.
column302: It Burns!: Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column303: It's Not Just Any Doll...: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.
column304: It's Baron Bunny!: Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column305: Wildfire: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.
